original_solution_mapping.L1: First find the length of the conclusion by tripling the length of the introduction: 450 words * 3 = <<450*3=1350>>1350 words
original_solution_mapping.L2: Then subtract the length of the introduction and conclusion from the total length to find the combined length of the body sections: 5000 words - 1350 words - 450 words = <<5000-1350-450=3200>>3200 words
original_solution_mapping.L3: Then divide the combined length of the body section by the number of body sections to find the length of each section: 3200 words / 4 sections = <<3200/4=800>>800 words/section

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1770.
    Returns: the length of each body section of the essay.
    """
    # L1
    introduction_length = 450 # The introduction will be 450 words
    triple_factor = 3 # triple the length of the introduction
    conclusion_length = introduction_length * triple_factor

    # L2
    total_essay_length = 5000 # If her essay has to be 5000 words total
    combined_body_sections_length = total_essay_length - conclusion_length - introduction_length

    # L3
    num_body_sections = 4 # each of the four body sections
    length_per_section = combined_body_sections_length / num_body_sections

    # FA
    answer = length_per_section
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: First find the length of the conclusion by tripling the length of the introduction: {introduction_length} words * {triple_factor} = <<{introduction_length}*{triple_factor}={conclusion_length}>>{conclusion_length} words

Then subtract the length of the introduction and conclusion from the total length to find the combined length of the body sections: {total_essay_length} words - {conclusion_length} words - {introduction_length} words = <<{total_essay_length}-{conclusion_length}-{introduction_length}={combined_body_sections_length}>>{combined_body_sections_length} words

Then divide the combined length of the body section by the number of body sections to find the length of each section: {combined_body_sections_length} words / {num_body_sections} sections = <<{combined_body_sections_length}/{num_body_sections}={length_per_section}>>{length_per_section} words/section
